Since she has a status of dead, we can assume that she was also a prison escapee from a different prison or inference can be made based on the pattern of other prisoners at Leavenworth.

6. Based on our analysis, the claim can be considered TRUE for the individuals we examined directly (rennes) and potentially true for joan leaven with the caveat that her status might be due to being a prison escapee from another prison or inference based on the pattern at Leavenworth.
